LoginPage.invalid-length-password: Password must be at least {0} characters long
LoginPage.at-least-one-lower-case: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter
LoginPage.at-least-one-upper-case: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
LoginPage.at-least-one-digit: Password must contain at least 1 digit
LoginPage.at-least-one-special: Password must contain at least 1 special character
LoginPage.no-white-space: Password must not contain any whitespace
